dinobros_dinostructplugin.name: Dinostruct
dinobros_dinostructplugin.description: The official Construct 3 Plugin by Dinobros used widely in all our projects. 🦖

auto-initialize.name: Auto Initialize
auto-initialize.desc: If enabled, the plugin will automatically initialize itself when the runtime starts.

timeout.name: Timeout (ms)
timeout.desc: The timeout in milliseconds to be used for network requests.

enable-log_events.name: Enable Log Events
enable-log_events.desc: If enabled, the plugin will log events to the database.

use-custom-log_events-endpoint.name: Use Custom Endpoint
use-custom-log_events-endpoint.desc: If enabled, the plugin will use a custom endpoint to log events rather than Firebase.

custom-log_events-endpoint.name: Custom Endpoint URL
custom-log_events-endpoint.desc: The URL of the custom endpoint to use for logging events.

firebase-api_key.name: API Key
firebase-api_key.desc: The API key to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-auth_domain.name: Auth Domain
firebase-auth_domain.desc: The Auth Domain to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-database_url.name: Database URL
firebase-database_url.desc: The Database URL to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-project_id.name: Project ID
firebase-project_id.desc: The Project ID to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-storage_bucket.name: Storage Bucket
firebase-storage_bucket.desc: The Storage Bucket to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-messaging_sender_id.name: Messaging Sender ID
firebase-messaging_sender_id.desc: The Messaging Sender ID to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-app_id.name: App ID
firebase-app_id.desc: The App ID to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-measurement_id.name: Measurement ID
firebase-measurement_id.desc: The Measurement ID to be used for the Firebase SDK.

firebase-default_region.name: Default Region
firebase-default_region.desc: The default region to be used for the Firebase SDK.

enable-app_check.name: Enable App Check
enable-app_check.desc: If enabled, the plugin will use App Check to protect the Firebase services.

recaptcha-site_key.name: ReCAPTCHA Site Key
recaptcha-site_key.desc: The ReCAPTCHA Site Key to be used for App Check.

is-large-number.description: Test if a number is greater than 100.

number.name: Number
number.desc: Number to test if greater than 100.

log-event.description: Log a event to the database.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of event to log.

log-event-payload.display-text: Log a [i]{0}[/i] event with [i]{1}[/i] payload to be empty: [i]{2}[/i]
log-event-payload.description: Log a event to the database.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of event to log.

payload.name: Payload
payload.desc: The payload JSON object to store with the event.

empty.name: Empty
empty.desc: If true, the payload JSON object will be empty after logging.
